plot: The entire Adult Population of the World has disappeared after a disastrous experiment in a Particle Collider. A tribe of 11 Children discover everyone over 15 has gone to a parallel dimension and so they trek across country to realign the two worlds and bring their Parents back.
plot_en: The entire Adult Population of the World has disappeared after a disastrous experiment in a Particle Collider. A tribe of 11 Children discover everyone over 15 has gone to a parallel dimension and so they trek across country to realign the two worlds and bring their Parents back.
plot_es: The entire Adult Population of the World has disappeared after a disastrous experiment in a Particle Collider. A tribe of 11 Children discover everyone over 15 has gone to a parallel dimension and so they trek across country to realign the two worlds and bring their Parents back.
title: The Sparticle Mystery
